text:
Vyacheslav Ivanovich Ezepov (7 October 1941 – 9 December 2020) was a Soviet-Russian actor. He was born in Saratov, Soviet Union. His career began in 1963. He was known for his roles in "Express on Fire" (1981), "Battle of Moscow" (1985) and in "Stalingrad" (1990).
He was awarded the People's Artist of the RSFSR in 1989 and People's Artist of Ukraine in 2004.
Ezepov died on 9 December 2020 in Moscow at the age of 79.
